name: Final Exam
description: Final exam for Introduction to Computer Science

name: FrontEnd Project
description: Developing a web application. This project will involve implementing modern web development technologies and best practices to create an intuitive and user-friendly interface.

name: UX Design Project
description: A hands-on Project focused on user experience (UX) design principles and techniques. Participants will learn about usability testing, wireframing, and prototyping to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: This exam covers fundamental data structures and algorithms essential for computer science and software engineering. Topics include arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, sorting algorithms, and searching algorithms. Students will gain a deep understanding of data organization and algorithmic problem-solving techniques.
